short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use BlankADS for a pleasant, private and uninterrupted internet surfing experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Video ads, pop-ups and unexpected redirects can annoy you.

To block online adverts, install the BlankADS extension.  This tool prevents the download of adverts, removes ad banners from various websites, and blocks online trackers that collect your personal information.

By using BlankADS, you will experience a significant decrease in the number of advertisements displayed on the internet. The extension blocks most ads, banners, and pop-ups, saving you time and internet traffic. This results in a more pleasant web browsing experience. If you wish to support content creators, you can whitelist their site in BlankADS settings to view their ads. 

Use BlankADS for a pleasant, private and uninterrupted internet surfing experience

Finally, BlankADS itself does not pose a threat to your online privacy. Although we block advertising requests, we do not have access to your network traffic, thanks to the use of manifest version 3. Additionally, we do not store any data about you. For more information, please visit our website.
